changeModes.Realtime_mode_tooltip: When enabled, your note in this device will be updated in real-time. Click for more details.
changeModes.Notify_edited_tooltip: When this mode and the realtime mode is both turned off, your note in this device won't be notified to be edited. Click for more details.
changeModes.Night_mode_tooltip: Turn on / turn off night mode (dark mode).

password.Logout_all_users_tooltip: When enabled, logout all other users also currently using this note after changing password successfully.
password.Add_Or_Change_Password_title: Add Or Change Password For This Note
password.Remove_Password_confirm: Confirm to remove password from this note?
password.Unset_password: You haven't set password for this note.

userInterface.Notify_edited_styling_tooltip: Change how your note will be notified to be edited
userInterface.Change_text_font_tooltip: Change text font for your note
userInterface.Nav_bar_position_tooltip: Change the position of navigation bar

editors.Notice_text: You can switch between editors for your note below. Note that when you use "Rich editor", your note will loose ability to update in real-time. If you want to update or sync your note, you have to reload (or refresh) page.
